column3: is a peer-reviewed journal that focuses on the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
column6: and the genres of myth and fantasy.  Beginning in [[2006]]
column7: Mythlore is published twice a year in the spring and fall as double issues.

column1: *[[1985]]: ''[[Mythlore 42]]'' (short supplemental issue to meet postal regulations)
*[[1985]]: ''[[Mythlore 44]]'' (short supplemental issue to meet postal regulations)
*[[1992]]: ''[[Mythlore 69]]'' (color covers; Tolkien Centenary issue; index to Tolkien articles in Mythlore)
*[[1996]]: ''[[Mythlore 80]]'' Proceedings of the 1992 Tolkien Centenary Conference; also ''[[Mallorn 33]]''
* [https://dc.swosu.edu/mythlore/ Online archive provided by SWOSU Digital Commons] (includes all issues from 82 onwards as well as most issues from 1-50)
